Description: Pottery ostracon, with one incised line of Coptic on exterior, from the rim of a vessel, inside rim white band with five black circles, rim also painted black, on interior of body faded white circle.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394043) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394043)
